column1: Architecture and Engineering for the Internet of Things (AEIOT)
column5: With billion of connected deviced providing a better understading of our environment, IoT is the new revolution of today's internet. This Master offers a deep understanding of the whol communication ecosystem : low power communications, interoperability, security and massive data processing. The program is aimed at future experts for the design and engineering of networks with a wide field of applications and a focus on IoT.
column7: Non-European students : 5,100 euros/ year - European students : 3,000 euros/ year
